website_summaries.verdict: The Kyocera DuraMax is a basic but durable handset that offers Direct Connect services over Sprint's faster CDMA network, but a couple of issues will prevent some iDEN customers from making the switch for now.
pros: The Kyocera DuraMax offers Direct Connect push-to-talk services on Sprint's faster CDMA network
The handset meets military specifications and feels very sturdy
cons: It offers a slow browsing experience
Direct Connect service doesn't work when out of a 3G coverage area

customer_reviews.title: She was having trouble with her smart phone. She has dementia and she was struggling ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom. She was having trouble with her smart phone. She has dementia and she was struggling making calls. But the flip phone is a lot easier to use. Also you can set-up phone numbers, so anyone can press let say #2. Once you do that, the name of the person comes up and all you have to do is press the green button to make the call. I type up a cheat sheet for her with all the names I programmed in the phone. Also very rugged phone too.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality flip phone
customer_reviews.text: My father is 76 yrs old and didn't want to be forced into a smartphone. He had this phone before and only had to let it go when the speaker was broken. This replacement came in perfect condition and it's still one of the most durable phones Sprint has carried. Sound and reception are great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Moore

customer_reviews.title: Men or whoever the most rugged almost indestructible cell phone that flips open.
customer_reviews.text: Not fancy but has everything you need for a basic RUGGED flip cell phone. If you are looking for a cell phone that is vertual indestructible for work for a Man this is it!!!!! I don’t think it is waterproof ! Dont know! The screens don’t get broke like the cell phones you can’t fold. Hard on cell phones buy this instead of lease all you need is a line!
customer_reviews.author: Carrine Hager

customer_reviews.title: Never got to use it but it was in great condition when it was received
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my dad cause his samsung mantra cellphone charger plug on his phone went bad but he didnt end up using this cellphone sorry to say.He did say the alarm well be used cause it gets good and loud.I took a loss but it is a nice heavy duty phone none the less.My Dad ended up going with a new cellular company and still not happy with the flip phone they gave him either. He wants that Samsung Mantra back but i have know idea how to find him one and he wont budge on getting a smart phone. Bummer.The delivery was very quick on this flip phone.Nice service and the phone was in good condition
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Don't get a flip phone at the sprint store with a contract!
customer_reviews.text: Great little phone. Everything about it is so much better than any flip phone that sprint carries in their stores before they want you to get a smart phone because the monthly bill is higher so if they put really crappy flip phones out it you feel almost coerced into going that way. If you want to stick with flip phones, get your but on amazon and buy a gently used, like-new condition model that is "out dated" by the actual date of production but a darn good product. I got my girlfriend this phone for like $25 after shipped with no contract at all and she's been happy as a clam with it for 9 months so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan H

customer_reviews.title: Ordered holder from Amazon and it is a pain to use so put it in my pocket which is not the best when you want to get it out quic
customer_reviews.text: Very rugged, dropped three times so far on concrete and still works. Came with no instructions, so "winging it". Ordered holder from Amazon and it is a pain to use so put it in my pocket which is not the best when you want to get it out quickly. Buttons on the side are a pain because I am always bumping them when trying to get the phone out from pocket. Picture quality is poor at best, but works. For the price, a decent phone for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: highplainsdrifter

customer_reviews.title: Phone not able to be activated
customer_reviews.text: The phone was not able to be activated with Sprint due to previously being reported stolen or lost. Very disappointed because this is the only phone my elderly stepdad will use. The amount of time plus energy spent to deal with this transaction is completely unacceptable. Now I have to go mail it back and wait on a refund while trying to find another phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Cant be activated
customer_reviews.text: Phone is unlocked but cant be set up to sprint anymore per the store.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: I DO LIKE THIS STYLE PHONE
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE HAD THIS STYLE PHONE SINCE 2005 AND HAVE HAD NO PROBLEMS EXCEPT FOR WEAR FROM CONSTANT USE. I LIKE THE SIMPLICTY OF THE PHONE AND NO ONE WANTS TO STEAL THIS STYLE PHONE. THE RUGGEDNESS OF THE PHONE MEANS THAT I DON'T HAVE TO BABY IT. WILL ORDER ANOTHER IN ABOUT ANOTHER 14 YEARS.
customer_reviews.author: paul boatman

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: This product doesnt work. It wont even turn on. This is so upsetting as I needed it for my sons trip. Misrepresentation as it shows damage on the side of the phone. DONT BUY products HERE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: anthony dorn

customer_reviews.title: good workhorse of a phone-nothing beats plain and good old fashion tried phone
customer_reviews.text: would certainally buy it again,good old fashion and straight to the point phone use-with no damn constant nagging app updates and ever increasing data pileups.A must buy for anyone just yearning for a quick and simple way of communicating with another human being.
customer_reviews.author: micheal marrero

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this phone for my 90 year old grandmother. It is extremely durable and easy to use. As of Dec 2019, it does in fact connect to the sprint network. I had to call their customer service and get a special sim card shipped to me, but all works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: C Y

customer_reviews.title: The ruggednes of of the device
customer_reviews.text: This is a used phone, a little wobbly on the hinge, but it is in a faily good condition. The controls worked fine and the sound is clear, with a full sounding speaker. It functions well, and it is good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Edman

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, practical alternative to smart phone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone hoping for a durable version of a flip phone. Only time will tell in regards to durability, but I am very pleased with it so far. It came with a decent battery, in great condition, and works perfectly well. In this day of the smart phones, it is difficult to find the more affordable, but wonderfully practical "old school" cell phone. I can highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lee from Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The product came in great condition! Though it was used it look almost new. The phone is for my father who doesn't have a use for a smartphone and this phone fits his needs perfectly. He is a bit hard of hearing and so far I haven't heard any complaints. The text on the screen can be enlarged for those with vision deficiencies.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for him.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a birthday gift.when we first switched to Sprint they didn't have any of these phones in the store.He was very unhappy with the phone they gave him.Now he's happy,and it's cheaper than the one at the Sprint store.No problems at all with activation or anything......Happy,Happy,Happy!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved this phone. I actually prefer the flip phone and the durability of the phone instead of a fragile touch screen. Great phone !
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Replace cell phone
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace my lost cell phone. Still under contract with sprint and it would cost over $120 to replace the phone. I found compatible cell phones on Amazon. Went with Kyocera DuraMax from Taylor Industries. Only cost $65 and received it in 3 days. Had no problem going to the Sprint store to get it activated.
customer_reviews.author: Stevedek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Senior phone
customer_reviews.text: Great for my Father (85yrs) easy to use, don’t need SIM card for sprint.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Pearson

customer_reviews.title: While I like the phone and the price
customer_reviews.text: While I like the phone and the price, I wish the buttons and the type was bigger. I bought the phone for my mother and she had those complaints. Other than that, it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This phone was purchased used, but I was surprised that the previous owners phone contacts were still on there. LOL! Other than that oddity.... it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone, Quality, and Price.
customer_reviews.text: Device was in great condition, got here fast, and works better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alec J. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: No seconds on this one.
customer_reviews.text: Disapointed. Text type is to small. Phone is a little to fat, un-neccessary buttons, sound quality poor to many calls.Looses signal way to often. Strong tho, bounces well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Moodybuddy

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera cell phone.
customer_reviews.text: Worked and arrived in a timely manner. Price was right. I Had to activate it at a sprint store. It Would not activate online. So 3 stars to sprint.
customer_reviews.author: Pipnoodles

customer_reviews.title: otherwise everything is great. I got it for my 9year old
customer_reviews.text: The appearance of the phone was a little wore down, otherwise everything is great. I got it for my 9year old, for his first phone. Great price, no issues conecting it to service. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Andylaliberte

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for people who dont want to use smart phones.
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone for my dad and he loves it. Was in GREAT condition, looked new! No problems setting it up with existing sprint contract.
customer_reviews.author: cristian g

customer_reviews.title: What an adventure it was to obtain this phone. ...
customer_reviews.text: What an adventure it was to obtain this phone. Through all of the confusion (on there part), they were very adamant to helo make things right. Long story short I am thankful for the customer service and there efforts to get us what we needed. Phone seems to work well, so no harm done. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ava Baker

customer_reviews.title: duramax
customer_reviews.text: I order this got it with in 3 days. took it to a sprint store to have it added to my acct. works great no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: mkanatzer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have excellent eyesight this phone is not what you will want screen size is extremely small.

customer_reviews.title: makes calls, is indestructible.
customer_reviews.text: perfect if you just want your phone to make calls and last forever. battery life is 1-2 weeks.

customer_reviews.title: Seller does not communicate
customer_reviews.text: The phone works but the seller will not respond with the security code so it can not be reset. Camera is cracked on the phone

customer_reviews.title: The phone is great. The only thing is the speaker when you ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone is great. The only thing is the speaker when you listen to voicemail has static or something. I've turned the volume down and it doesn't seem to help. Other than that small issue, I love the phone. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne B. Calka

customer_reviews.title: Really Good!
customer_reviews.text: Order two phones and received them three days later. Phones where in excellent condition with battery and mini sd card. Only thing is I did not receive either chargers for phones, but i will let people know for the prices of these phones they are in the best shape just like they came out the box and i am glad i gave this company a chance.
customer_reviews.author: ChaseMorrison1

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHONE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone on April 9th and received on April 11th, 2013. I purchased this phone to replace a phone I already have under a sprint plan. It came in very good condition. Love it so much I ordered another. thank you for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. W.

customer_reviews.title: Flip Phone -- difficult to buy at a storefront.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Use it for everyday communication by phone.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Tusing

customer_reviews.title: He fell in love with it once we adjusted the font size and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad. He needs the rough and tough type of phone that can withstand falling out of his pocket when he is working on his cars. He fell in love with it once we adjusted the font size and made it larger.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, it is tough and works just the way it should. No problems at all.

customer_reviews.title: Was told I would have no problem activating this phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Was told I would have no problem activating this phone through sprint. Sprint can not activate it because it is locked.
customer_reviews.author: Adams

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Received 4 "like new" phones. One of the phones had a cracked camera screen and one of the batteries is bent and has burn marks on it. Other than that the phones were activated and all work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I rate it satisfactory, but I would not buy another of the same.
customer_reviews.text: The phone went dead twice and I had to remove the battery and replace it both times to make it work again. Also the print on the screen is too small to check the battery life and the time.
customer_reviews.author: P. D. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: She has to restart it due to the screen blacking out sometimes but other than that its perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My Grandmother's loves this phone. She has to restart it due to the screen blacking out sometimes but other than that its perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: The phone cuts off on its own after 3 days of using it.

customer_reviews.title: mom loves it
customer_reviews.text: needed something simple and durable for my parents and they love this phone. its worked great! even my brother asked where i got it since he wanted one.

customer_reviews.title: Late but Great
customer_reviews.text: The phone didn't get here till like two weeks after the last estimated date, which was disappointing. But none the less, it still came and even though it said it was used it was still in perfect condition. It's just a great deal in general for the money you spend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaydee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am bad with phones as far as dropping them. This phone is rugged enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: RUDOLPH LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was wanted
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what my husband was looking for, when he needed to replace his lost phone. Since he just wanted a basic flip phone, that was rugged, this fits the bill! The number keys are easy to use, and it has all the features he was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Diane J

customer_reviews.title: Good for granny
customer_reviews.text: Simple and functional. Brought it for my 80 yr old mother in law who didn't want a smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU WANT TO TEXT
customer_reviews.text: It is not clear from the product description that the texting process takes forever. I was on travel. When I came back and checked the phone, I realized that it has this old style keyboard where you you have to press the same button three times or less to select each letter. I contacted the seller after 30 days, so they did not have to return the phone.However, the seller's response was very negative. They did not offer to work with me at all. Therefore, if you value texting, DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE.
customer_reviews.author: Ziad

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera Dura Max
customer_reviews.text: I lost this phone that was given to me from my job. Had to replace it and love that its as good as my old one I lost. Easy to connect through Sprint.
customer_reviews.author: Cecy

customer_reviews.title: speedy service
customer_reviews.text: He bak lock clip wad broke , very speedy delivery faster than expected works great just the back clip broke would have gave 5 if wasnt broke
customer_reviews.author: tkl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase. This advanced flip offers enough features than ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. This advanced flip offers enough features than needed for most people without paying for marketing ploys. Who wants a I pad hanging out of your shirt while in a sports car or enjoying the outdoors. Compact and durable equals PRACTICAL. The seller was great, the price blew away the sprint store. OVERALL, AMAZON, THE COMPANY/SELLER AND THE CUSTOMER/ME ALL ARE HAPPY. IT IS JUST LIKE MY SECOND WIFE. WONDERFUL. THANK YOU KEVIN
customer_reviews.author: kevin meyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone when you don't need a smart phone !!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Spencer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I chose to rate it to five stars because it is a wonderful phone and it has many features .

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera Duramax
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could buy another one at the same great price I bought this one. Actually I bought two from different sellers. Both were as represented.

customer_reviews.title: Greattt
customer_reviews.text: The product was Greatttt I'm very pleased. I orderderd this for my father his not much of a technology guy lol doesn't really understand smart touch screen phone. It was also shipped quickly. I love it. Defenetly recommended the price of the device was also great not to expensive not to cheap. Nd it was in perfect condition no scratches no defects at all what so ever I had no problem getting it connected either.my dad loves it. Thank You.!

customer_reviews.title: but i hear it works great, i'm more of a smartphone person myself
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't for me, but i hear it works great, i'm more of a smartphone person myself. I'm sorry i can't give any detailed review.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: I bought two
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these because they are rugged and built for a little more abuse than a normal phone. They are used by pre-teens, and so far I am quite pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for mom
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed!! I wanted a jitterbug but have sprint service, this works perfect. Ringer is loud and buttons are a good size. Shipped really quick too! Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works better than my b/friends phone that he paid 300 for

customer_reviews.title: Iam going to return, It was for my Mother ...
customer_reviews.text: Iam going to return,It was for my Mother in law,she tried to activate thruSprint,they told her it was a pay for minute phone..

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone was just what I needed but the charging jack does not always work. You have to place it and twist it just right to charge
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Shulenburg

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased the phone for my mother. ..she enjoys it...great quality it was in impeccable condition and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera s sturdy phones, Duramax.
customer_reviews.text: Have not been able to use it yet, but found out its a very good phone.
customer_reviews.author: KATHY CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this phone,did not last a month and would not take a charge! phone was great when it was working.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A Bollinger

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good and sturdy.Price was right.
customer_reviews.text: It came quickly and is a basic phone like my dad wants and needs for his big arthritic fingers to be able to dial the numbers. And it's sturdy so far and he works outside in all kinds of weather and it gets dropped occasionally, etc. The only issue has been the key protect feature. We turned it off? so he could just open the flip and answer. But the buttons are too sensitive on the side so it kept doing stuff automatically by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Steph in the NW

customer_reviews.title: I wa amazed. Extremely pleased with this phone
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very rough on phones so I bought him this in hopes it would last a little longer. My expectations have been surpassed. It does what it's supposed to. He makes and receives calls. This isn't a texting phone. He took this with him kayaking in the salt water one time. Long story short, he was tipped in rough water and lost the phone. Short time later I got a call that it washed up on a beach and still works. I wa amazed. Extremely pleased with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: CAOB

customer_reviews.title: Great signal and very durable
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of constant notifications from my smart phones and the bill was getting more and more difficult to justify. I ordered this phone and was instantly surprised at how much better the phone signal is, I can use this phone without worrying about standing by a window or outside. The phone is "built to military specs" and I have dropped this phone pretty hard, nothing happened, the battery stayed in place and it didnt even scratch it. If you are looking for a phone only, I highly recommend this one. I gave it only 4/5 stars because it does not have wifi, a feature that is necessary from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Killingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing phone I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing phone I've ever had. It durable, reliable, takes a charge up to 5 days and is a beast of a phone. When my smart phone screen cracks...which has happened over and over again, I transfer service to this and I've never had a problem aside from misplacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Great condition and was even able to activate over the phone with Sprint (can be done online also). Great rugged/masculine phone.
customer_reviews.author: MattsViews

customer_reviews.title: It is the king of Flip Phones
customer_reviews.text: Nothing comes close. Not a smart phone, but I wasn't looking for internet on the fly. Durable beyond any other phone. Battery life incredible.
customer_reviews.author: saul

customer_reviews.title: Great performance and long long lasting battery!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my mom who's 76 and it works great, it has a decent volume for everything, it's heavy duty and we love the fact the battery lasts forever. Beyond happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bernice

customer_reviews.title: Phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone looks great It came with no charger but it’s ok because I have my own . Have not used the phone yet but it looks great
customer_reviews.author: artofrealty

customer_reviews.title: ... hubby is old time and will not get a smart phone this phone is easy for him to use
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is old time and will not get a smart phone this phone is easy for him to use. He loves it. but then all he does is talk on it. Nothing else. It is a sturdy phone.. I would recommend if you want a flip phone.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: I now have a verizon flip phone with 4g I can still text with smart phones and the calls sound good
customer_reviews.text: Sprint/phone does not do group texts well with this phone It died for a few hours one day and would not turn on. I now have a verizon flip phone with 4g I can still text with smart phones and the calls sound good.

customer_reviews.title: I love my flip phone
customer_reviews.text: I love my flip phone! Just what I needed to replace my old one that drowned in the porcelain bowl.

customer_reviews.title: Great rugged dumb phone.
customer_reviews.text: For a dumb phone, its durable and robust with great battery life. If they'd just let me check my email on it, I'd just own one of these.

customer_reviews.title: That's right, it's a FLIP phone...
customer_reviews.text: My friends laugh at me because it isn't an iPhone. I will choke someone about my flip phone though. Don't play with me.....HA HA HA.. Great phone....Thanks....Shoot, it even has navigation....
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: My wife requested a tough and simple phone for ger work cell so we purchased this. Easy set up on Sprint and no issues what so ever. Will purchase from again when I need a new cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Gann

customer_reviews.title: Simple - Easy to Use - Rugged
customer_reviews.text: Its simple and easy to use . Very Rugged.. I like it because it has nothing hard to figure out or try and jump thru hoops to get it to work ... I know it may not be for everyone,,, But, Works great for me. .

customer_reviews.title: Good basic flip phone with PTT
customer_reviews.text: Nice rugged phone for the person who doesn't need all of today's technology. Does support Sprint's Push to Talk network, which worked pretty well.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a used phone
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a used phone. Just what my husband needed. He is not a smart phone kind of guy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Phone arrived in good shape and already charged
customer_reviews.text: Phone arrived in good shape and already charged.. Missing small memory card, Had spare, no problem. I am very pleased with both the phone and the service/

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My husband goes through phones like they are going out of style. This one is heavy duty and came in near mint condition. I couldn't be happier especially with the price. The seller shipped fast. I highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best phone for my 83 yr old dad who is technologically challenged!!! So is his wife.

customer_reviews.text: Works as well as expected, very basic phone, cannot update system since it is so basic.

customer_reviews.text: Def. a used phone - and description was accurate (no charger, no booklet, some scratches) but very pleased with it.

customer_reviews.text: Got this for a business line, calls only and was very happy with the product. Very well made and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I looks like a really solid quality product so far.

customer_reviews.title: Great, quick, tough flip device
customer_reviews.text: Came in great shape, clean, and works wonderfully on Tello service. Very glad we purchased this! Getting around on it is very quick too! We started with a cheap (but more expensive than this one!) Alacatel that was horrific to get around on and couldn't default to T9 text mode... This was such a relief to get this out of the package and zoom around, default to T9 and not be frustrated. Seems extra tough! Perfect to send with our 13 year old anywhere without worrying about all the smartphone worries.

customer_reviews.text: Got it for my Dad to replace his broken one, he calls it "his device", so it had to be the same. A great phone and was very well priced. Thank you

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for construction. I would have bought two but one really gets the job done. All in all, a good phone

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for need
customer_reviews.text: Phone was everything I expected. Only downside was that apparently there is no headphone jack according to my son who uses the phone.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It came fast and works and is all good,Its still being used today and has not broken or anything and the camera works and has GPS and etc so great.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis

customer_reviews.title: Clamshell Phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my mother in law. She needed something inexpensive, simple, basic, and visible. When she received it I helped her via phone to activate it with Sprint. It took a while, but we accomplished the activation. She says the phone is very sturdy and easy to use. She seems to enjoy her new phone. So, that makes me happy. I would definitely recommend it to others..
customer_reviews.author: Honesty

product_meta.title: Kyocera DuraMax E4255 PTT Rugged Black Sprint
product_meta.description: The Kyocera DuraMax E4255 is a rugged, durable cell phone adhering to military standard 810G for dust, shock, vibration, temperature extremes, blowing rain and water immersion up to 30 minutes in up to 1 meter. The DuraMax also features a 3MP camera with video recording and a LED flash, multi-format player, push-to-talk, Bluetooth functionality and GPS navigation. This is a highly durable phone with excellent sound quality.
